BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO HK_AREA_TYPE_MST(STR_AREA_TYPE_NAME, NUM_AREA_TYPE_ID, NUM_TOTAL_AREA, NUM_NO_OF_ROOM, NUM_NO_OF_TOILET, NUM_NO_OF_CORRIDOR, NUM_NO_OF_STAIR, GSTR_REMARKS, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE HK_AREA_TYPE_MST SET STR_AREA_TYPE_NAME=?,NUM_TOTAL_AREA=?, NUM_NO_OF_ROOM=?, NUM_NO_OF_TOILET=?, NUM_NO_OF_CORRIDOR=?, NUM_NO_OF_STAIR=?,GSTR_REMARKS=?,GNUM_ISVALID=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_AREA_TYPE_ID=? and gnum_hospital_code=?
UPDATE HK_AREA_TYPE_MST SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_AREA_TYPE_ID=? AND gnum_hospital_code=?
